body_html:
I'm able to reproduce with this simplified case:

import tensorflow as tf

with tf.device("/gpu:0"):
  tf.Variable([False, False, True, True, False, False, True, True])

session_config = tf.ConfigProto(allow_soft_placement=False, log_device_placement=True)

with tf.Session(config=session_config) as sess:
  init_op = tf.global_variables_initializer()
  sess.run(init_op)

So it seems boolean Variables cannot be placed (or at least initialized) on the GPU.

@mrry, can you take a look?

body:
I'm able to reproduce with this simplified case:

```python
import tensorflow as tf

with tf.device("/gpu:0"):
  tf.Variable([False, False, True, True, False, False, True, True])

session_config = tf.ConfigProto(allow_soft_placement=False, log_device_placement=True)

with tf.Session(config=session_config) as sess:
  init_op = tf.global_variables_initializer()
  sess.run(init_op)
```

So it seems boolean Variables cannot be placed (or at least initialized) on the GPU. 

@mrry, can you take a look?
